title: 281 - MFM Guest Host Picks #4: Brandie Posey
description:
Throughout the months of June and July, Exactly Right family members will be guest hosting My Favorite Murder! Each week a guest host will pick their favorite stories from Karen and Georgia.

Today's episode is hosted by Brandie Posey, co-host of Lady to Lady on Exactly Right. Brandie shares the stories of the Forth Worth Three Kidnapping and John Wayne Gacy (Live from the Chicago Podcast Festival - Episode 44).
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
